LanguageData.WNA_Ashpark.label: ashpark steel
LanguageData.WNA_Ashpark.description: Grayish spongy substance, though named "steel" but actually more stony and nothing metallic. Desppite its poor properties, this substance is still of great value, as it can be transformed into a highly ferocious and dangerous matter. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_AttunementFabric.label: attunement fabric
LanguageData.WNA_AttunementFabric.description: Composite metallic fabric woven in a specific pattern. In WNA headquarters it's confirmed that this fabric can attune with its wearer and enhance their performance in various way. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_ChimingSteel.label: chiming steel
LanguageData.WNA_ChimingSteel.description: Red, lumen, transparent metallic material, one must be very cautious to touch it in case being harmed by this ferocious matter. Though it seems (and actually) very durable, it's actually a very unstable matter, just a small piece can boil up the whole universe. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_Cinnabar.label: cinnabar
LanguageData.WNA_Cinnabar.description: One kind of mercury-containing ore, red in color, looks nice. It's relatively stable so you can use it to construct something, if you dare. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_Concrete.label: reinforced concrete
LanguageData.WNA_Concrete.description: Improved concrete reinforced with metal frame structure, not only practical but also universal, and looks not bad. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_DarkAsbestos.label: dark asbestos
LanguageData.WNA_DarkAsbestos.description: A bunch of black inorganic fiber, names as "asbestos" as it's originally made from stone materials. Unusually durable. Rumours said sentient creatures can attune to this fiber to gain great strength from it, but whether this mathod exists is still unproven. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_Desolisium.label: desolisium alloy
LanguageData.WNA_Desolisium.description: A copy of an military alloy material which possesses brown hue, excellent durability and insulation properties. Great for making armors. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_Trinisium.label: trinisium alloy
LanguageData.WNA_Trinisium.description: A copy of an military alloy material which possesses deep blue hue, excellent malleablitily and conduction properties. Great for making weapons. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_Voidsteel.label: voidsteel
LanguageData.WNA_Voidsteel.description: A thick, light, transparent, mysterious matter, looks oily, feels like liquid, natually sharp-shaped. Though it's named as voidsteel, it doesn't come from the void actually. People who knows this matter well usually describe this as something flows out from dark side of one's mind. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
